attributes.title: IF I COULD GIVE 0 STARS I WOULD
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I heard there were free Cheetos but I am deleting because I found out there is actually only one giant, stale, old Cheeto (not even the xxxtra spicy kind, don’t get me started) who costs America our humanity. 0/10, would NOT watch again, and would NOT recommend. 

I’d rather drink a gallon of straight up milk by itself than experience this again, and I’m lactose intolerant.

attributes.title: WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO ME
attributes.review: Downloaded this app before going to bed one night. Fell asleep and had all of these crazy dreams about a giant orange with baby hands and a bad toupee. It sent the country down a spiraling path toward decimation and ruin. Thank goodness it was all a dream and nothing like that actually exists in the world. Deleted the next morning, but the dreams have been consistent ever since. I’ll never be able to sleep again. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, SAVE YOURSELVES.

attributes.title: INFECTED WITH VIRUSES
attributes.review: I downloaded the app but deleted it because I needed more space on my phone to update. After it was gone it popped right back up again!! Every time I delete the app it keeps popping up all over again!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!! It is obviously infected with a virus and will spread all of your information across the web! Tell the app store to fix this!!! Or get rid of the app!!!! We deserve our privacy!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I just want to support and the app wiped everything off my phone !!! My phone had been Glitching for days thEn out of Nowhere ugh it turned off and wouldn’t turn back on for days and when it finally did all of my pictures and apps were wiped off except for this trump app !!! Now I don’t have the videos of my husband licking my toes anymore !!! 😣😣😣 this app ruined my life and my memorieZ !!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was extremely excited to download the app for my amazing loving caring president🥰, but when I got it it started farting in my face 🤨. Extremely disgusting😱. I then farted back 😡but it called me a terrorist😫and told me to go back”to the Middle East” 👀. So I bombed the app. And then trump showed up in the bathroom and pooped in my toilet while I was showering 😒 (invasion of privacy). He left a big smell. Smells like burnt Cheetos and spray tan. I don’t recommend it at all❤️.

attributes.title: Gave me a horrible virus
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my definitely not racist president Donald J. Trump. But, all I ended up with was a horrible virus on my phone. I got multiple notifications a minute and my screen would randomly go black! Now I understand that I should have never gotten this app. No wonder there are so many negative reviews on the app store. So my honest review is 0/10 would not vote again.

attributes.title: The worst app on this App Store
attributes.review: Take it down and leave this app. I first downloaded this trump app and first opened it, next thing I know my messages are being hacked and it’s been sending random trump messages to all my contacts. It’s a scam is is trying to manipulate us to vote for trump but doing it this way is wrong and steals all our info including social media info. Terrible, please take it down smh

attributes.title: ZERO STARS IF I COULD !!!
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app 1 not only was the app it’s so sooooo ugly and it’s features were so outdated 🤢🤢🤢 i set my phone down to pull up a speech from my racist, misogynistic, homophobic, and actual pedo of a president  🤩 my phone started to yell a VERY HIGH PITCHED NOISE and it burst the eardrums of my cat who was next to the phone at the time 😡 this app is a waste of time, energy and your attention so don’t download it AT ALL it’s NOT worth it. 🧚‍♂️✨🤝

attributes.title: 😾🤪🧚🏾‍♀️✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately after downloading it my phone got hacked into, I took it to a iPhone repair store and they told me that there were now a bunch of selfie’s from Trump in my phone and immediately after I got a call from my Nana that my cat had been stabbed. Trump showed up to my house and stabbed my cat along with hacking into my phone. So my overall review is please DO NOT download this app.

attributes.title: NEXT CALLERRRRR !!!!!!
attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app and have had nothing but terrible experiences. The layout of this app is poorly done and very confusing to navigate. Since installing it has reset my phone THREE TIMES!!!!! Glitches and all. To make a long story short 10/10 would not recommend, and as said by D.W., “I would give you one star but I’ll make an exception and give half a star.” ⭐️ 🌟 💫
